isis.stitle: SPRING ASSEMBLIES AND SHOCK ABSORBERS - REMOVE

svcproc.title: REMOVE
svcproc.para: The exact service procedures will vary for each type of spring. A general guideline follows:

step1.para: Place a floor jack under the vehicle frame, and raise the vehicle enough to relieve all the weight from the spring to be removed.
When removing the rear spring to have better access to spring, remove rear wheels from the axle side being serviced. Refer to GROUP 17 - WHEELS, RIMS AND TIRES in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual.
Remove the U-bolts and retaining nuts, the spring bumper and retainer and the spring bottom plate.
Remove the lubricators (not on springs having rubber bushings).
Remove nuts from the spring shackle pins and the bracket pins.
Slide the spring off the bracket pin and shackle pin.
